html: The Lord God "The Lord Jehovah" - " אדני Adonai , the Lord, makes the line longer than the preceding and following; and the Septuagint, Alexandrian, (and MSS. Pachom. and 1. D. II.), and Arabic, do not so render it. Hence it seems to be interpolated." - Dr. Jubb. Three MSS. have it not. See the note onIsaiah 61:1 ; (note). Both words יהוה אדני Adonai Jehovah , are wanting in one of my MSS.; but are supplied in the margin by a later hand.
